formattedAddress: 304 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 304 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023-1948, USA

originalText.text: Best deal on UWS and friendly people! There is always availability for machines and dryers, and if all machines are being used, the friendly employees do their best to shuffle things around to ensure you're able to do laundry ASAP. The staff is great and always keeps the location clean!

text.text: Best deal on UWS and friendly people! There is always availability for machines and dryers, and if all machines are being used, the friendly employees do their best to shuffle things around to ensure you're able to do laundry ASAP. The staff is great and always keeps the location clean!

originalText.text: Seems good to me. I just used it for the first time. Plenty of machines open and they look to be clean and in good shape. My last place always had moldy looking seals on the washing machines and the ones here are spotless. The dryers are pretty dang expensive at $0.25 for 4 minutes instead of the 7 or 8 I was used to, but maybe they're a lot more efficient than the ones I used before at my old place? I guess I'll figure that out after I get my clothes out this time. Anyway, this place is super-convenient to my apartment so it'll probably be my go-to from now on, although I may give a couple of others a look just in case.

originalText.text: This is the only laundromat I’ll go to. Friendly owners, clean, always available washers and dryers. I usually do self service but I’ve had them do my laundry a few times, prices were fair and laundry came out great.

text.text: This is the only laundromat I’ll go to. Friendly owners, clean, always available washers and dryers. I usually do self service but I’ve had them do my laundry a few times, prices were fair and laundry came out great.

originalText.text: Best price and service for wash and fold on the UWS. I called 10 UWS wash/fold services and tried different ones before. They charge $11.50 for the first 10 lbs (minimum is 10 lbs), over 10 lbs $1.15/lb. Free delivery and pickup. Tip the delivery guy!

text.text: Best price and service for wash and fold on the UWS. I called 10 UWS wash/fold services and tried different ones before. They charge $11.50 for the first 10 lbs (minimum is 10 lbs), over 10 lbs $1.15/lb. Free delivery and pickup. Tip the delivery guy!

originalText.text: Miss the friendly atmosphere of Soap One's previous owners, though wash / dryers were often broken, it was still a friendly, kind efficient place. This current rendition was clean when it opened and is now disgusting. It should be a pickup / drop off only service as it is super busy and its main focus is on this clientele. The gent who runs it is kind and so are his kids, though everyone else is rude. He does his best to accommodate the self wash / dry individuals, though it is a wash factory, often with long waits for washers / dryers with  no room to fold. If you are going to chance it on your own go super early in the AM, when they first open or possibly after 3:30pm on weekdays. Otherwise drop it off and have them do it. And to note if you are self washing, bring a broom as there are hairballs, dryer sheets and plastic flying everywhere.
